column2: 《HKEx》- 03360 FE HORIZON - Monthly Return of Equity Issuer on Movements in Securities for the month ended 31 December 2020
FE HORIZON (03360.HK): Mulls Spinning Off Equipment Operation Biz for Separate Listing
《HKEx》- 03360 FE HORIZON - VOLUNTARY ANNOUNCEMENT PROPOSED SPIN-OFF AND SEPARATE LISTING OF THE EQUIPMENT OPERATION BUSINESS OF THE GROUP
